page_not_found_content: Возможно, страница, которую вы ищете, была удалена, переименована или временно недоступна.
severe_problem: Большая проблема жизни и смерти является самой актуальной !!!
tomorrow_death: Если ты умрешь завтра, куда ты пойдешь ???
seven_things_left_behind: 7 things left behind by Shishuang Qingzhu
seven_things_left_behind_2: Stop all discriminating and opposing views such as body and mind, agent and object
seven_things_left_behind_3: Extinguish all the fever of enlightenment and delusion, of the mundane and the holy, to reach a cool state
seven_things_left_behind_4: Maintain a single thought of suchness and stillness
seven_things_left_behind_5: There is no longer any form of discrimination
seven_things_left_behind_6: Get rid of all attachments, like the incense in an ancient temple disappearing
seven_things_left_behind_7: In the process of understanding the Buddha Dharma, regardless of the True Position (representing the Empty Realm of True Suchness) or the bias (representing the Phenomenon of the Form Realm) are all clearly defined, without any trace of doubt, like a pure white silk without dye.
